description.value: Your ikon extends to an impossible length, striking all in its way. You deal @Damage[(max(6,floor(@actor.level / 2)))d8[untyped]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], with a @Check[reflex|against:exemplar|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. The damage type matches that of your weapon. At 14th level and every two levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d8.
